title: Боцман Чайка
overview: Brave sailor Ivan Khristoforovich — male in full bloom and well-known womanizer, immediately goes in search of a bride. However, this rush has nothing to do with the fact that the boatswain is reluctant to say goodbye to the free life. For many years he is on a fishing boat and cannot imagine their life without the sea. And then suddenly the government announced the reduction, and under it fall all the bachelors...The chief gives Ivan Khristoforovich to marry just two weeks. In search of companion, the Seagull is always ready to help mom — teacher for the life of Lidia, and his faithful "squire", sailor nick vorobeichik, although that family life in continuous turmoil.
